column4: Is Ralink RT73 (RT2571) wifi cards supported out-of-box in feisty?
Looking to buy a laptop?
nope
Ok :P
Tried ndiswrapper?
Seems to be two drivers present for it already, ndiswrapper shouldn't be needed
Not necessarily.
I had a friend with the present drivers, and it didn't work... Ndis fixed it. Make sure to pull out the other ones and put them into /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist
Did he try the http://rt2x00.serialmonkey.com/ driver?
She :P Geeks can be girls too!
Naw, but it works and she's very happy with it.
Sorry, Female geeks simply doesn't excist here, so I'm pretty used to male geeks
Thanks for your help! I'll try the serialmonkey driver, then ndiswrapper
No problem
Don't forget to pull out the other mods
They conflict and make things not work.
I'll remember to blacklist them, thanks again
Ctrl+alt+f6 I think
ctrl+alt+f7 sends you back to a gui
ctrl+alt+f1-f6 are all terminals
isn't there a console command for that? (ssh connection)
Not sure.
